message: Great, we'll be sure to take pictures along the way to document our  build process.
Here we could even win a Kinect :)

Instructables just plublished a "Build a Quadcopter" in their newsletter http://app.streamsend.com/c/14236025/421349/FHvpyx2/Bfu4?redirect_to=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.instructables.com%2Fid%2FRC-Quadrotor-Helicopter%2F. On a side note, I think I need to order some different motors
For the instructable, they also uploaded their code. @Paniag, might be worth taking a look at.
Maybe different motors from a more convenient source. I'm sure somebody we know knows somebody who knows where that might be.
